metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: AJAX is a developer's dream, because you can:
content.html: AJAX is a developer's dream, because you can:

content.text: Try it Yourself Examples in Every Chapter
In every chapter, you can edit the examples online, and click on a button to view the result.
content.html: In every chapter, you can edit the examples online, and click on a button to view the result.

content.code_html: Let AJAX change this text

content.code: Let AJAX change this text
content.code_html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>

<div id="demo">
  <h2>Let AJAX change this text</h2>
  <button type="button" onclick="loadDoc()">Change Content</button>
</div>

</body>
</html>

content.text: The HTML page contains a <div> section and a <button>.
content.html: The HTML page contains a <div> section and a <button>.

content.text: The <div> section is used to display information from a server.
content.html: The <div> section is used to display information from a server.

content.text: The <button> calls a function (if it is clicked).
content.html: The <button> calls a function (if it is clicked).

content.text: The function requests data from a web server and displays it:
content.html: The function requests data from a web server and displays it:

content.code_html:
function loadDoc() {
  var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
  xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
    if (this.readyState == 4 && this.status == 200) {
     document.getElementById("demo").innerHTML = this.responseText;
    }
  };
  xhttp.open("GET", "ajax_info.txt", true);
  xhttp.send();
}

content.text: The "ajax_info.txt" file used in the example above, is a simple text file and looks like this:
content.html: The "ajax_info.txt" file used in the example above, is a simple text file and looks like this:

content.code:
AJAX

AJAX is not a programming language.

AJAX is a technique for accessing web servers from a web page.

AJAX stands for Asynchronous JavaScript And XML.
content.code_html:
<h1>AJAX</h1>
<p>AJAX is not a programming language.</p>
<p>AJAX is a technique for accessing web servers from a web page.</p>
<p>AJAX stands for Asynchronous JavaScript And XML.</p>

content.text: AJAX = A synchronous J avaScript A nd X ML.
AJAX is not a programming language.
AJAX just uses a combination of:
AJAX is a misleading name. AJAX applications might use XML to transport data, but it is equally common to transport data as plain text or JSON text.
content.html: AJAX is a misleading name. AJAX applications might use XML to transport data, but it is equally common to transport data as plain text or JSON text.

content.text: AJAX allows web pages to be updated asynchronously by exchanging data with a web server behind the scenes. This means that it is possible to update parts of a web page, without reloading the whole page.
content.html: AJAX allows web pages to be updated asynchronously by exchanging data with a web server behind the scenes. This means that it is possible to update parts of a web page, without reloading the whole page.
